name: The Prince Edward
storyline: The Prince Edward is such a little great prince from the royal family, who is getting bored right now and you have to do something about it. Letting away all this royal stuff, he is an ordinary young boy, who has normal concerns of his age, despite of his family's goals for him, to be the future king of the kingdom. This thing isn't impossible but until then, he wanna feel some real thrills and vibes, as a real kid of his age. Let's help him do something crazy and fortunately for you, in that huge palace, the opportunities for doing such some things, are uncountable. Go for it right now, before there will be too late and make sure that you will make Edward feel, however he wants, but especially funny by pranking another people in the castle, by interacting with different stuff from there. Everything starts from his own room, where he is locked at this moment. Use the k key in order to collect different stuff, which will be added to his inventory. In order to check the inventory, you need to click on the I key of the keyboard. Good luck and wander in the castle, trying to find different things to approach and this way make sure that you will find the perfect recipe for fooling different people!
summary: The son of King Henry IV, prince Edward, is a very naughty boy no one can stop. One night, in the royal palace, boredom takes over Edward.
